backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization and storage mixins plus comprehensive resident, medication, physician, and related data types and comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI styling requirements to affected files and components with associated metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files including components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying global background and border defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML document setting up the root element and loading the frontend entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements the application root with authentication, resilient backend actor initialization, profile gating, and TanStack Router route setup.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for adding ADL records with controlled form fields, solid white UI styling, and mutation submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog form for entering and submitting daily vital signs for a resident, including date, time, vitals, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog to record medication administration for a resident, selecting an active medication and submitting administration details.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog for adding a new medication to a resident, capturing dosage, route, schedule, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large dialog for creating a new resident with full demographic, medical, physician, pharmacy, insurance, contacts, and medication details.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a weight measurement for a resident, including date, value, unit, and notes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component rendering the brand logo with configurable size and fallback text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component for editing a resident’s medication, managing form state and submitting updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog for editing a resident’s full profile, including personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form that saves the caller’s name, role, and employee ID using useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen UI showing startup failures, diagnostics, retry and logout actions, using Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity context and provider managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related backend data through a resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with timeouts and optional admin setup, exposing its state via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific CSS rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Utility helpers for actor initialization including timeout wrapping, error normalization, and non-fatal error detection.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates safe asset URLs using Vite’s base path, normalizing slashes and handling edge cases.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Date utilities for converting dates to and from backend nanoseconds and formatting or calculating age without timezone issues.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing resident lists with filtering, sorting, and actions, integrating various React Query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and a styled card UI.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays a detailed resident profile with data fetching, editing dialogs, medication and vitals management, and extensive UI controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, plugins, and extended utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, and known issues for the Moritz Care Home system.
